title: Welcome!
text: I am a Research and Teaching Assistant at the Department of Communication and Media Research at University of Zurich. My research is situated in Communication Science, Psychology and Human–Computer Interaction, with a particular focus on AI-based persuasion, misinformation, and media effects. I care about statistical inference and transparent, reproducible research practices. Always happy to chat.

title: Welcome!
text:
Open Science
I value scientific integrity because it brings together core principles that are essential for building and maintaining trust among scientists and between science and society. Adherence to reliability, honesty, transparency, and accountability is the core of accumulating knowledge. Thus, I strive to make my research as reliable, transparent and reproducible as possible. Please reach out if anything is unclear, insufficiently reported, not reproducible, or if you have suggestions for improvement. —-
